message: This is a newly started NGO to work on student entrepreneurship, with technical support from industrial volunteers.
story: 林 森泉 shared a Page to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: learn and hand on entrepernerushp in 8 weeks 學習8周實作創業
name: 創業工作坊 startup camp

data.message: Posts without problem and proposed solutions will be hidden. You may refer to the pinned post for more details.

Apology for that. I know this is a huge problem, but lets hope we can make it happen!  

1 Solve the knowledge/ innovation culture gap between mainstream countries like USA and Taiwan. 

2  Innovative knowledge sharing portal between US/Taiwan, can be industrial partnership. or any other possible suggestions

3 so far, that is how we come up with NGO, innovatist , with concept to inspire students in Taiwan to work on innovative global projects with support from Industrial volunteers.
